Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: The course analyzes the historical shift from a "production-centered" society to a "consumption-centered" one, examining the development of retailing and department stores as economic structures.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: The course focuses on the development of "department stores" as a central form of commercial infrastructure and an innovation in the retailing industry ("小賣業").
